verses.verse: "I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> vine, <S%G288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the farmer. <S%G1092><s%>

Remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> and I <S%G2504><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> the branch <S%G2814><s%> can't <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> bear <S%G5342><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> by <S%G575><s%> itself, <S%G1438><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> it remains <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the vine, <S%G3779><s%> so neither can <S%G3761><s%> you, <S%G5210><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me. <S%G1698><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the vine. <S%G288><s%> You <S%G5210><s%> are the branches. <S%G2814><s%> He who remains <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> and I <S%G2504><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> bears <S%G5342><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from me <S%G1700><s%> <S%G3756><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> doesn't <S%G3361><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> he is thrown <S%G906><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a branch, <S%G2814><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is withered; <S%G3583><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they gather <S%G4863><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> throw <S%G906><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire, <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they are burned. <S%G2545><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> you remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> you will ask <S%G154><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you desire, <S%G2309><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it will be done <S%G1096><s%> for you. <S%G5213><s%>

"In <S%G1722><s%> this is <S%G5129><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> glorified, <S%G1392><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you bear <S%G5342><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> fruit; <S%G2590><s%> and so <S%G2532><s%> you will be <S%G1096><s%> my <S%G1698><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Even as <S%G2531><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has loved <S%G25><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> also have loved <S%G25><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> Remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may be made full. <S%G4137><s%>

"This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you love <S%G25><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> I have loved <S%G25><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

No <S%G3765><s%> longer do I call <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> does. <S%G4160><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> I have called <S%G2046><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> friends, <S%G5384><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have made known <S%G1107><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>

You didn't <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3756><s%> choose <S%G1586><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> appointed <S%G5087><s%> you, <S%G5210><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> should go <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bear <S%G5342><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> should remain; <S%G3306><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G99999><s%> whatever <S%G302><s%> you will ask <S%G154><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> he may give it <S%G1325><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>
"I command <S%G1781><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may love <S%G25><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it has hated <S%G3404><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> before <S%G4412><s%> it hated you. <S%G1097><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> this happened so that <S%G2443><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> may be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> law, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3404><s%> 'They hated me <S%G3165><s%> without a cause. <S%G1432><s%>'

<S%G1161><s%> "When <S%G3752><s%> the Counselor <S%G3875><s%> has come, <S%G2064><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will send <S%G3992><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> will testify <S%G3140><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
